page.title: 11Mixed Farm
page.content: Lobby Farm was originally part of Snitterton Hall.The farm is now owned by Ron,Ivan and Shaun.They have a dog called Gyp.When he was a puppy he used to chase the lambs.They had one orphan lamb that I called Larry.They have 25 Hereford and 40 Fresian cows that give 450 litres of milk a day and a few bullocks.There are 85 lambs born of 55 Gunnforest ewes. The farm uses lots of modern machinery including a baler,tractor,and muck spreader. For hay making there is a cutter,tedder and baler. They have recently used the farm to film Silas Marner.The film also included shots of Oaker Hill, down in Northerndale and Wensley Dale.
